name: Dark HackerRank
description:
HackerRank, but darker! I saw there was a distinct lack of any kind of userstyle available so I decided I'd throw something together using my limited CSS knowledge and... imperfect theming skills.
Purple variant here: https://userstyles.org/styles/113079/purple-hackerrank
additional_info:
15/05/2015 - Realised the domains page looked horrid and there was a random white box on the profile page. Fixed.
15/05/2015 - Hey, that works on the buttons too! Awesome!
28/05/2015 - More fixups. It's a bit of a pain to figure some of these things out. Webby stuff just loves to bury hidden stuff under sneaky stuff obscured by weird things that don't make much sense :|
29/05/2015 - More fixups
31/05/2015 - Code submission cancel button (though not the confirm button, likely thanks to my /amazing/ CSS skills) fixed, fixed a big white bar after code submission
02/12/2015 - Updated some front-page stuff and the login page (who sees those anyway, right?) as well as the new feed page.
06/01/2016 - More updates, fixed up everything I saw. The code editor is less awful now!

discussions.name: Code editor is difficult to use
